sentences.zh: 四年，晉昭公卒，其六卿彊，公室卑。

translations.literal: Fourth year, Jin Zhao Gong died, his six dukes strong, gong chamber lowly.

sentences.zh: 子產謂韓宣子曰：「為政必以德，毋忘所以立。」

translations.literal: Zi Chan told Han Xuan Zi said: "Govern must with virtue, not forget so established."

sentences.zh: 六年，鄭火，公欲禳之。

translations.literal: Sixth year, Zheng fire, gong wished pray it.

translations.literal: Zi Chan said: "Not as cultivate virtue."

sentences.zh: 八年，楚太子建來奔。

translations.literal: Eighth year, Chu crown prince Jian came fled.

sentences.zh: 十年，太子建與晉謀襲鄭。

translations.literal: Tenth year, crown prince Jian with Jin plotted attack Zheng.

sentences.zh: 鄭殺建，建子勝奔吳。

translations.literal: Zheng killed Jian, Jian son Sheng fled Wu.
Eighth year, Chu crown prince Jian came fled. Tenth year, crown prince Jian with Jin plotted attack Zheng. Zheng killed Jian, Jian son Sheng fled Wu.

sentences.zh: 十一年，定公如晉。

translations.literal: Eleventh year, Ding Gong went Jin.

sentences.zh: 晉與鄭謀，誅周亂臣，入敬王于周。

translations.literal: Jin with Zheng plotted, executed Zhou chaos minister, entered Jing Wang at Zhou.
Eleventh year, Ding Gong went Jin. Jin with Zheng plotted, executed Zhou chaos minister, entered Jing Wang at Zhou.

sentences.zh: 十三年，定公卒，子獻公蠆立。

translations.literal: Thirteenth year, Ding Gong died, son Xian Gong Juan ascended.

sentences.zh: 獻公十三年卒，子聲公勝立。

translations.literal: Xian Gong thirteenth year died, son Sheng Gong Sheng ascended.

sentences.zh: 當是時，晉六卿彊，侵奪鄭，鄭遂弱。

translations.literal: At this time, Jin six dukes strong, invaded seized Zheng, Zheng then weak.
Thirteenth year, Ding Gong died, son Xian Gong Juan ascended. Xian Gong thirteenth year died, son Sheng Gong Sheng ascended. At this time, Jin six dukes strong, invaded seized Zheng, Zheng then weak.

sentences.zh: 聲公五年，鄭相子產卒，鄭人皆哭泣，悲之如亡親戚。

translations.literal: Sheng Gong fifth year, Zheng chancellor Zi Chan died, Zheng people all cried wept, grieved like lost relatives.

sentences.zh: 子產者，鄭成公少子也。

translations.literal: Zi Chan was Zheng Cheng Gong younger son.

sentences.zh: 為人仁愛人，事君忠厚。

translations.literal: Person benevolent loved people, served lord loyal thick.

sentences.zh: 孔子嘗過鄭，與子產如兄弟云。

translations.literal: Confucius once passed Zheng, with Zi Chan like brothers.

sentences.zh: 及聞子產死，孔子為泣曰：「古之遺愛也！」

translations.literal: When heard Zi Chan died, Confucius wept said: "Ancient legacy love!"

Sheng Gong fifth year, Zheng chancellor Zi Chan died, Zheng people all cried wept, grieved like lost relatives. Zi Chan was Zheng Cheng Gong younger son. Person benevolent loved people, served lord loyal thick. Confucius once passed Zheng, with Zi Chan like brothers. When heard Zi Chan died, Confucius wept said: "Ancient legacy love!"

sentences.zh: 八年，晉范、中行氏反晉，告急於鄭，鄭救之。

translations.literal: Eighth year, Jin Fan, Zhong Xing clan rebelled Jin, informed urgent Zheng, Zheng saved them.

sentences.zh: 晉伐鄭，敗鄭軍於鐵。

translations.literal: Jin attacked Zheng, defeated Zheng army at Tie.
Eighth year, Jin Fan, Zhong Xing clan rebelled Jin, informed urgent Zheng, Zheng saved them. Jin attacked Zheng, defeated Zheng army at Tie.

sentences.zh: 十四年，宋景公滅曹。

translations.literal: Fourteenth year, Song Jing Gong extinguished Cao.

sentences.zh: 二十年，齊田常弒其君簡公，而常相於齊。

translations.literal: Twentieth year, Qi Tian Chang assassinated his lord Jian Gong, Chang chancellored Qi.

sentences.zh: 二十二年，楚惠王滅陳。

translations.literal: Twenty-second year, Chu Hui Wang extinguished Chen.

sentences.zh: 孔子卒。

translations.literal: Confucius died.

Fourteenth year, Song Jing Gong extinguished Cao. Twentieth year, Qi Tian Chang assassinated his lord Jian Gong, Chang chancellored Qi. Twenty-second year, Chu Hui Wang extinguished Chen. Confucius died.

sentences.zh: 三十六年，晉知伯伐鄭，取九邑。

translations.literal: Thirty-sixth year, Jin Zhi Bo attacked Zheng, took nine cities.
Thirty-sixth year, Jin Zhi Bo attacked Zheng, took nine cities.

sentences.zh: 三十七年，聲公卒，子哀公易立。

translations.literal: Thirty-seventh year, Sheng Gong died, son Ai Gong Yi ascended.

sentences.zh: 哀公八年，鄭人弒哀公而立聲公弟丑，是為共公。

translations.literal: Ai Gong eighth year, Zheng people assassinated Ai Gong established Sheng Gong younger brother Chou, this was Gong Gong.

sentences.zh: 共公三年，三晉滅知伯。

translations.literal: Gong Gong third year, three Jin extinguished Zhi Bo.

sentences.zh: 三十一年，共公卒，子幽公已立。

translations.literal: Thirty-first year, Gong Gong died, son You Gong Ji ascended.

sentences.zh: 幽公元年，韓武子伐鄭，殺幽公。

translations.literal: You Gong first year, Han Wu Zi attacked Zheng, killed You Gong.

sentences.zh: 鄭人立幽公弟駘，是為繻公。

translations.literal: Zheng people established You Gong younger brother Tai, this was Xu Gong.

Zheng people established You Gong younger brother Tai, this was Xu Gong.

sentences.zh: 繻公十五年，韓景侯伐鄭，取雍丘。

translations.literal: Xu Gong fifteenth year, Han Jing Hou attacked Zheng, took Yong Qiu.

sentences.zh: 鄭城京。

translations.literal: Zheng walled Jing.
Xu Gong fifteenth year, Han Jing Hou attacked Zheng, took Yong Qiu. Zheng walled Jing.

sentences.zh: 十六年，鄭伐韓，敗韓兵於負黍。

translations.literal: Sixteenth year, Zheng attacked Han, defeated Han troops at Fu Shu.

sentences.zh: 二十年，韓、趙、魏列為諸侯。

translations.literal: Twentieth year, Han, Zhao, Wei listed as feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 二十三年，鄭圍韓之陽翟。

translations.literal: Twenty-third year, Zheng surrounded Han Yang Di.
Sixteenth year, Zheng attacked Han, defeated Han troops at Fu Shu. Twentieth year, Han, Zhao, Wei listed as feudal lords. Twenty-third year, Zheng surrounded Han Yang Di.

sentences.zh: 二十五年，鄭君殺其相子陽。

translations.literal: Twenty-fifth year, Zheng lord killed his chancellor Zi Yang.

sentences.zh: 二十七，子陽之黨共弒繻公駘而立幽公弟乙為君，是為鄭君。

translations.literal: Twenty-seventh, Zi Yang party together assassinated Xu Gong Tai established You Gong younger brother Yi as lord, this was Zheng Jun.

sentences.zh: 鄭君乙立二年，鄭負黍反，復歸韓。

translations.literal: Zheng Jun Yi established second year, Zheng Fu Shu rebelled, again returned Han.

sentences.zh: 十一年，韓伐鄭，取陽城。

translations.literal: Eleventh year, Han attacked Zheng, took Yang Cheng.
